com.rt.printerlibrary.printer

Class RTPrinter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rt.printerlibrary.printer.RTPrinter<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LabelPrinter, PinPrinter, ThermalPrinter, UniversalPrinter

    public abstract class RTPrinter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Tony on 2017/11/21.
    Operation: connect, disconnect, write messages, read message, get the current printer interface(connection object).
